item.title: How to learn Hacking and bug bounty
item.description: by Fasal :sunglasses: Programming Knowledge Programming knowledge is a must obviously. Learn Python,PHP,JS,HTML&CSS :rocket: Basic knowledge about HTML,CSS&JS is must. Learn any server side language like Python,PHP or Ruby. If you want to code your own exploits, learn C. :bulb: The python book Learn python3: the hardway is a good resource. Install and setup stuffs :construction: Things you need and need not. A :computer: running any linux based OS :white_check_mark: (You can also use windows, but it sucks.
